title: tAyE dayai
sahitya:
tAyE dayai purivAi en kuraigaLai nIyE nangarivAi
tanjam aLittiDa dayai purivAi ammA 


anupallavi

  pEyAm ulagilE sEyEn paDutuyar pEshi muDiyAdE piDittEn un pAdamE


caraNam    maNNAshai ulagilE mamatai narakilE mana mAyak-kATTilE dhana mAyak-kUTTilE
puNNAgi nOgirEn kaNNArak-kANammA pughalaDaindEn unnai nighar tuNai vEruNDO
